content: this historical-inspired pattern is for a hat that is great for gifting the design is based on an aztec tile mosaic **size ** osfm teen-adult **materials** - **dk to worsted** yarn 220-280yds/200-250m to 100g - you will need a main color mc background color bgc in a light or dark and a contrast color cc the opposite of the background color so dark if bg is light light if bg is dark - alternately you could use sport weight to achieve a child size - beginning of round stitch marker **needle size ** 16 40cm long circular needle in size 5-6 4 75-5mm for worsted or size needed to obtain gauge gauge is important to size the pattern is designed with just a little negative ease you should get 20st/22 row to 4 /10cm in worsted you will need dpns for decreases **stitches used** k = knit p = purl k2tog = knit 2 together mc = main color go crazy go wild bgc = background color pale or dark cc = contrast color dark if bg is pale or vice versa co = cast on
